title: Under Apron
description: a) brown beaded fringe, brown/black and white beads hanging over brown/tan on black geometric embroidery; b) brown fringe with black/white beads attached to cord; (a) and (b) are tied together
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
